item.title: AWS S3 CLI
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: AWS s3 (Simple Storage Service) is one of the simplest Amazon Web Service. It works just like a network drive. Amazon has granted many public institutions free S3 buckets. Smithsonian Institute (SI) is one of them. With its open access initiative, SI also shared a large amount of data on s3. Smithsonian Open Access on github AWS registry for Smithsonian The data largely contain metadata at SI, 3D models, and pictures.
